00143 inline int CPolygon::GetNodesCount() const
00144 {

00149 inline const i2d::CVector2d& CPolygon::GetNode(int index) const
00150 {
00151        Q_ASSERT(index >= 0 && index < int(m_nodes.size()));
00152 
00153        return m_nodes[index];
00154 }
